item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

no problem, i’ll explain some more.

} else if (NPCID == "SHOPKEEPER ID") { //"SHOPS NAME OF KEEPER PutNPCCoords = true; ///// leave this, this way WanneShop = "CREATE AN OWN NUMBER FOR YOUR SHOP"; //Varrock Armor shop

now you could make a shop in client.java

item.title: Need help with shops [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

how much items did you add?
1 (buy/sell) = general store
2 (buy/sell) = a shop like horvik

and did you add it to your client.java?
if not, add something like this in it:

} else if (NPCID == 549) { //Horvik PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 10; //Varrock Armor shop
hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with shops [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

i have three things to say:
edit the client.java
edit the shops.cfg
edit the autospawn.cfg

client.java: search for " wanneshop ", then copy the method and edit it
shops.cfg: easy, put the items of your shop in there, also the shop id
autospawn.cfg: easy, autospawn a trading shopkeeper, and put the shop with other shops.

i think you’ll know now
if not, you can ask more info.
greetzzz

Read full topic
